Data management and analytics
1
Took ownership of the on-premise Funds Admin Data Warehouse, and drove the 
transition of SSRS Reporting to Power BI, enhancing automation and collaboration
Private equity firm

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Picture this…
You’re looking to manage their current on-premise Data Warehouse (on SSMS) and associated SSRS reporting as well as 
drive the gradual transition of the reporting to Power BI, aiming to enhance automation and foster improved collaboration. 
Currently, lacking in the the resources to adequately maintain their Fund Admin Data Warehouse and manage incoming requests 
from end users.
Private equity firm needs data management and analytics
2
Your value is enhanced. 
•
You have improved the data accuracy of fund performance and Portfolio Company financial performance reports to about 80%
•
Workflow automation enabled real-time visibility into data field changes for relevant users, enabling them to take prompt action 
as necessary
DATA MANAGEMENT AND ANALYTICS
KEY RESULT   
•
Improved the data 
accuracy of the fund 
and Portfolio Company 
performance reports to 
about 80%
VALUE LEVERS PULLED
•
Data warehouse 
maintenance
•
BI reporting on power 
BI
2
You turn to Accordion. 
We partner with your team to take ownership of the on-premise Funds Admin Data Warehouse, and drove the transition of SSRS 
Reporting to Power BI, enhancing automation and collaboration, including:
1) Developing comprehensive documentation for the existing data infrastructure including detailed data dictionaries, 
dimensional models and data lineage for all key SSRS reports
2) Configuring the Power BI environment, established guidelines for the report development process (from requirements 
gathering to final deployment), and developed appropriate templates to gather/record information at each stage of the 
process
3) Implementing a workflow automation system using Jira and Teams to streamline communication and ticket creation for 
changes in slowing-changing fields relevant to investments in the Investran system
4) Enhancing multiple reports (such as NAV disclosure for Portfolio companies, Carried Interest/Co-investment Report to 
track Fund Performance) catering to the Funds Admin team and other business functions to enable the team to track the 
business’ performance more effectively and with improved accuracy

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Accordion Value Add 
•
Developed comprehensive documentation for the existing data infrastructure including detailed data dictionaries, dimensional models and data lineage for 
all key SSRS reports
•
Configured the Power BI environment, established guidelines for the report development process (from requirements gathering to final deployment), and 
developed appropriate templates to gather/record information at each stage of the process
•
Implemented a workflow automation system using Jira and Teams to streamline communication and ticket creation for changes in slowing-changing fields 
relevant to investments in the Investran system
•
Enhanced multiple reports (such as NAV disclosure for Portfolio companies, Carried Interest/Co-investment Report to track Fund Performance) catering to 
the Funds Admin team and other business functions to enable the team to track the business’ performance more effectively and with improved accuracy
Situation
•
Client lacked the resources to adequately maintain their Fund Admin Data Warehouse and manage incoming requests from end users
•
Partnered with the client to manage their current on-premise Data Warehouse (on SSMS) and associated SSRS reporting as well as drive the gradual 
transition of the reporting to Power BI, aiming to enhance automation and foster improved collaboration
Data Management & Analytics for PE Firm
3
Impact
•
Improved the data accuracy of fund performance and Portfolio Company financial performance reports to about 80%
•
Workflow automation enabled real-time visibility into data field changes for relevant users, enabling them to take prompt action as necessary
Data Management and Analytics

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Power BI configuration
4
4
Tenant settings configuration
Power BI lifecycle management
Content management & collaboration
Security management and adoption
1
2
3
4
Reviewed and configured the Tenant Settings for Power BI to ensure appropriate resource management, security, compliance, customization, thus enabling a positive user experience 
within the organization’s Power BI environment
Established thorough guidelines and supporting documentation outlining the entire lifecycle of Power BI reports. This encompasses the process from initial report creation, publishing, 
versioning, through to archiving and retirement. Additionally, crafted custom Power BI templates that adhere to brand guidelines, ensuring consistency in design. Developed templates 
for requirements gathering and KPI documentation to provide users with structured support in developing BI assets
Created a structured framework in Power BI for seamless resource collaboration, employing workspaces, folders, and organized content for enhanced accessibility. Established clear 
guidelines for workspace naming conventions and defined user roles across development, testing, and production environments. Implemented a streamlined process for managing 
change requests from users to ensure efficient adaptation to evolving needs.
Established guidelines for consumer-level security planning in Power BI reports. Also, outlined guidelines for content creators, emphasizing methods to enhance content discoverability 
among end-users through certification and promotion for organization-wide usage
1
2
3
4
